channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #67 – Graphics 2.0 – 2.5D Isometric Perspective and Belly Dancing App Dev

item.title: By: helios
item.dc:creator: helios
item.description: so much for the Graphics 2.0 tutorials. . do you have a working, clear example on how to "post, share,invite" features on Facebook??? been a month trying to do it, all i can do access facebook log-in interface
item.content:encoded:
so much for the Graphics 2.0 tutorials. . do you have a working, clear example on how to “post, share,invite” features on Facebook???
been a month trying to do it, all i can do access facebook log-in interface
